```{r}
library(reshape2)
library(lfstat)
#Can't cbind livneh as it has one day less (Feb 29) in its count
#Deal with Livneh separately

Livneh_Mer <- Livneh_Gen_Mer[-c(2,3,4)] 
Livneh_Mer <- melt(Livneh_Mer, id = "node") %>% mutate(`Flow Scenario` = "Baseline")
Livneh_Mer

Livneh_Mer_SWRCB <- Livneh_Gen_Mer_SWRCB[-c(2,3,4)] 
Livneh_Mer_SWRCB <- melt(Livneh_Mer_SWRCB, id = "node") %>% mutate(`Flow Scenario` = "40% Full Natural Flow")
Livneh_Mer_SWRCB

Livneh_Mer_FF <- Livneh_Gen_Mer_FF[-c(2,3,4)] 
Livneh_Mer_FF <- melt(Livneh_Mer_FF, id = "node") %>% mutate(`Flow Scenario` = "Functional Flows")
Livneh_Mer_FF

Gen_Mer <- cbind(CanES_Gen_Mer[-c(2,3,4)], CNRM_Gen_Mer[-c(1,2,3,4)], 
                HadGEM_Gen_Mer[-c(1,2,3,4)], MIROC_Gen_Mer[-c(1,2,3,4)], 
                CMCC_Gen_Mer[-c(1,2,3,4)], ACCESS1_Gen_Mer[-c(1,2,3,4)],
                HadGEMCC_Gen_Mer[-c(1,2,3,4)], CESM_Gen_Mer[-c(1,2,3,4)],
                CCSM4_Gen_Mer[-c(1,2,3,4)], GFDL_Gen_Mer[-c(1,2,3,4)]) %>% mutate(`Flow Scenario` = "Baseline")

Gen_Mer_SWRCB <- cbind(CanES_Gen_Mer_SWRCB[-c(2,3,4)], CNRM_Gen_Mer_SWRCB[-c(1,2,3,4)], 
                HadGEM_Gen_Mer_SWRCB[-c(1,2,3,4)], MIROC_Gen_Mer_SWRCB[-c(1,2,3,4)],
```
